spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: You cast one of the following wizard spells (spell save {@dc 11}), using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent if used with two hands.

action.name: Mans Ardents (Conjur de Nivell 1; 2/Dia)
entries: You shoot forth a 15-foot cone of fire. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area que ningú estigui portant o vestint.

action.name: Bala de Foc (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} Ranged Spell Attack: {@hit 3} a impactar, range 120 ft., un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: You cast one the following cleric spells (spell save {@dc 11}), using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip)
entries: You target one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de radiant. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant, or 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany tallant if used with two hands.

bonus.name: Shove
entries: While wielding a shield, you try to shove one creature within 5 feet of you.
